title: Saboo Takaki Was Paralyzed in a Bike Crash and Told He’d Never Walk Again. This Is His Inspiring Journey Back to Cycling.
content:
A two-decade journey of regaining mobility has taken a big leap forward in recent years, thanks in part to e-bikes.
